Package GameModel

Class unoGame

java.lang.Object
GameModel.unoGame
All Implemented Interfaces:
gameConstants, unoConstants
public class unoGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements gameConstants
The unoGame class serves as an instance of the game. Sets up game, players and etc.

    • unoGame

      public unoGame​(int mode, int cardsDealt, java.lang.String specialDraw, java.lang.String pName, gameController gc)
      Default class constructor creates instance of UNO game.
      Parameters:
      mode - - game mode.
      cardsDealt - - number of cards dealt
      specialDraw - - special draw instructions
      pName - - player's name
      gc - - the instance's game controller

      public void drawPlus​(int numCards)

      Parameters:
      numCards - - number of cards to be drawn.
